attributes.action: abolish cosmetic surgery, IVF,sex changes etc on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the NHS is there for all citizens to have genuine illnesses diagnosed and treated in the quickest time possible. It is not the National Happiness service, cosmetic surgery except for burns victims, IVF , sex changes all take up valuable resourses and are not neccessary for preservation of life. Please stop all unneccessary procedures and use the money for dentistry and health care.
